name: Roy Tang
text: I totally flubbed the follow-up. Luckily Frank and Paxi were here to save you all.    I was genuinely worried that someone on my friends list would post their credit card details and someone would subscribe him to a bunch of porn sites and his wife would find out when she sees the credit card statement and they would separate and she would take the kids and he was slip into a months-long depression before finally a misplaced sock causes him to snap and take an entire MRT train hostage before being killed in a hail of bullets, causing me to be late for work.
